name: Assorted Zines
description:
Free Shipping!
I currently have 4 different zines available for purchase:

(Clockwise from top left)

"Trash"- this 14 page zine is half black and white/ half color and examines the multiple meanings of trash through a series of poetry, archival prints, and found art.

"Under&Over"- a b&w zine containing all original witty writing and illustrations. 14 pages.

"Hand"- a b&w collection of hands that use simple lines to capture a series of distinct human emotions. 12 pages.

"Back/Hair"- A red, black, and white zine that includes a collection of images and written word excerpts that evoke the connotations of the human back and hair. 12 pages.

name: Miu Miu Inspired Brooches
description:
Free Shipping!
These hand crafted brooches were inspired by patterns used in the Miu Miu runway collection. Each brooch is comprised of two layers of thick card stock, enclosed with a plastic casing for durability, and made to order. All brooches are hand drawn and are available for customisation for an additional fee of $3. Each brooch is $5 and the options (pictured from left to right) are as follows:

- Cat Butt (My own creation)
- Cat Front
- Silhouette Naked Lady
- Minimalist Naked Lady

Note: For those interested in a customised brooch, please email me at Maudestheory@yahoo.com prior to your purchase so we can discuss what kind of design you would like to implement. Even if you have a very loose concept of the custom features you would like, I would be more than happy to work with you to create your brooch.

name: Books
description:
Free Shipping!
Six books currently available. Both new and used but all in good condition:

(Clockwise from top left)

SOLD "The New York Regional Mormon Singles Halloween Dance"- a memoir by Edna Baker (New Hard Cover)

SOLD "RoadStrips"- A graphic journey across America containing stories by a plethora of authors (New Soft Cover Full Color Graphic Novel)

"Disgrace"- by J.M. Coetzee (Used Hard Cover with my notes in it)

"Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close"- by Jonathan Safran Foer (Like New Soft Cover with my notes in it)

"Holidays On Ice"- by David Sedaris (Used soft cover)

"Aesthetics: A Graphic Guide"- by Christopher Kul-Want & Piero (New Soft Cover Graphic Novel)

name: Dresses
description: Free Shipping! Three different dresses currently available. (From left to right) Vintage Sparkle Dress- A woman's large (approx. 10-12). Dress falls a couple of inches below knee. The dress is blue with an attached belt that buckles at the back of the dress and can adjust waist size(both of which are sparkly). This dress is in great condition and was made in the mid 1980's. Vintage Go Go Dress- A woman's medium (approx. 7-9 but has give). Very much a mini dress that falls on the mid upper thigh. Dress is white and in very good condition. Made circa 1975. Black Scoop Neck- Because the style of this dress is loose fit it would be suitable for anyone between the sizes of 8-14. Dress falls right at knee and has large velvet heart patch on the bottom right corner (original to dress and a slightly darker black than the dress itself). Contemporary dress in great condition. For more pictures please contact me via the contact link on the right hand side of the page.
